description.zh-cn: 中国企业家、政治人物，曾任中国民间商会副会长、中国泛海控股集团董事长兼总裁。
description.en: A Chinese entrepreneur and politician, formerly served as the Vice Chairman of the China Chamber of Commerce for the Private Sector, and Chairman and President of China Oceanwide Holdings Group.

en: China Chamber of Commerce for the Private Sector

description.zh-cn: 由中华全国工商业联合会主管的全国性非营利性会员组织。
description.en: A national non-profit membership organization supervised by the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce.

zh-cn: 泛海控股股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 一家中国的综合性企业集团，业务涵盖金融、房地产、能源等领域。
description.en: A Chinese conglomerate with businesses in finance, real estate, energy, and other sectors.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会
en: 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的第十一届组织。
description.en: The 11th session of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中华全国工商业联合会

zh-cn: 中华全国工商业联合会
en: All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的以非公有制企业和非公有制经济人士为主体的人民团体和商会组织。
description.en: A people's organization and chamber of commerce led by the Communist Party of China, primarily composed of non-public enterprises and individuals in the non-public sector of the economy.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会经济委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会经济委员会
en: Economic Committee of the CPPCC National Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的两所证券交易所之一，位于广东省深圳市。
description.en: One of the two stock exchanges in the People's Republic of China, located in Shenzhen, Guangdong.

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第九届全国委员会
en: 9th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的第九届组织。
description.en: The 9th session of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

en: 10th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的第十届组织。
description.en: The 10th session of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会
en: 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的第十二届组织。
description.en: The 12th session of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 卢志强现任中国民间商会副会长。
description.en: Lu Zhiqiang currently serves as the Vice Chairman of the China Chamber of Commerce for the Private Sector.

description.zh-cn: 卢志强担任中国泛海控股集团董事长兼总裁。
description.en: Lu Zhiqiang serves as the Chairman and President of China Oceanwide Holdings Group.

description.zh-cn: 卢志强于1952年出生于山东威海。
description.en: Lu Zhiqiang was born in Weihai, Shandong in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 卢志强毕业于复旦大学经济学系。
description.en: Lu Zhiqiang graduated from the Department of Economics at Fudan University.

description.zh-cn: 卢志强是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Lu Zhiqiang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中华全国工商业联合会

description.zh-cn: 卢志强曾担任中华全国工商业联合会副主席。
description.en: Lu Zhiqiang served as the Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 2008年，卢志强当选第十一届全国政协常务委员，代表中华全国工商业联合会。
description.en: In 2008, Lu Zhiqiang was elected as a Standing Committee Member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC, representing the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 卢志强曾担任全国政协经济委员会专委。
description.en: Lu Zhiqiang served as a special committee member of the Economic Committee of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2024年1月26日，深圳证券交易所决定终止泛海控股股份有限公司的股票上市。
description.en: On January 26, 2024, the Shenzhen Stock Exchange decided to terminate the listing of the shares of China Oceanwide Holdings Co., Ltd.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第九届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，卢志强是第九届全国政协委员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Lu Zhiqiang was a member of the 9th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，卢志强是第十届全国政协委员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Lu Zhiqiang was a member of the 10th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，卢志强是第十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Lu Zhiqiang was a member of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.
